SELECT COUNT(AA.BOARD_SN) FROM BSNS_BOARD AA /* 업체_게시판 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_BOOK AB /* 업체_게시판_책소개 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AB.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AB.BOARD_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_IMG AC /* 업체_게시판_이미지 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AC.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AC.BOARD_SN AND AC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_GBN_CD = #{boardGbnCd}
AND AA.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AA.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(AA.SUBJECT, AA.CONTENT) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AB.BOOK_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AB.BOOK_PUBLISHER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT AA.BSNS_CODE /* 업체_코드 */ ,AA.BOARD_SN /* 게시판_일련번호*/ ,AA.BOARD_GBN_CD /* 게시판_구분_코드 */ ,(SELECT PSCC.DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM PKHL_SYS_CMMN_CODE PSCC WHERE 1=1 AND PSCC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PSCC.BSNS_CODE = AA.BSNS_CODE AND PSCC.CMMN_CODE = AA.BOARD_GBN_CD ) AS BOARD_GBN_CD_NM /* 게시판_구분_코드_명 */ ,AA.SUBJECT /* 제목 */ ,AA.CONTENT /* 내용 */ ,AA.HIT_COUNT /* 조회 수 */ ,AA.LIKE_COUNT /* 좋아요 수 */ ,AB.BOOK_WRITER /* 책_지은이 */ ,AB.BOOK_PUBLISHER /* 책_출판사 */ ,AB.BOOK_PRICE /* 책_가격 */ ,AC.BOARD_FL_SN /* 게시판_이미지_일련번호 */ ,AC.ORIGIN_FL_NM /* 원본_이미지_명 */ ,AC.FL_NM /* 이미지_명 */ ,AC.FL_PATH /* 이미지_경로 */ FROM BSNS_BOARD AA /* 업체_게시판 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_BOOK AB /* 업체_게시판_책소개 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AB.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AB.BOARD_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_IMG AC /* 업체_게시판_이미지 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AC.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AC.BOARD_SN AND AC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_GBN_CD = #{boardGbnCd}
AND AA.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AA.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(AA.SUBJECT, AA.CONTENT) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AB.BOOK_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AB.BOOK_PUBLISHER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
ORDER BY AA.BOARD_SN DESC LIMIT #{limitFirst}, #{limitSecond}

SELECT AA.BSNS_CODE /* 업체_코드 */ ,AA.BOARD_SN /* 게시판_일련번호*/ ,AA.BOARD_GBN_CD /* 게시판_구분_코드 */ ,AA.SUBJECT /* 제목 */ ,AA.CONTENT /* 내용 */ ,AA.HIT_COUNT /* 조회 수 */ ,AA.LIKE_COUNT /* 좋아요 수 */ ,AB.BOOK_WRITER /* 책_지은이 */ ,AB.BOOK_PUBLISHER /* 책_출판사 */ ,AB.BOOK_PRICE /* 책_가격 */ ,AC.BOARD_FL_SN /* 게시판_이미지_일련번호 */ ,AC.ORIGIN_FL_NM /* 원본_이미지_명 */ ,AC.FL_NM /* 이미지_명 */ ,AC.FL_PATH /* 이미지_경로 */ ,AD.MEM_ID /* 회원_ID */ ,AD.LIKE_YN /* 좋아요_사용여부 */ FROM BSNS_BOARD AA /* 업체_게시판 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_BOOK AB /* 업체_게시판_책소개 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AB.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AB.BOARD_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_IMG AC /* 업체_게시판_이미지 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AC.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AC.BOARD_SN AND AC.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN BSNS_BOARD_LIKE AD /* 업체_게시판_좋아요 */ ON AA.BSNS_CODE = AD.BSNS_CODE AND AA.BOARD_SN = AD.BOARD_SN AND AD.MEM_ID = #{sessionId} WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_SN = #{boardSn}
